versos: (reserved) 1 Peter 1:4 - "To an inheritance incorruptible, and undefiled, and that fadeth not away, reserved in heaven for you,";;;
(hated) "If the world hates you, keep in mind that it hated me first." - John 15:18 NIV;;;
(mourning) Matthew 5:4 - "Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.";;;
(fury) Psalm 78:49: He unleashed his anger against them; he sent a band of destroying angels.;;
(anger) Proverbs 14:29 - "Whoever is slow to anger has great understanding, but he who has a hasty temper exalts folly.";;;
(forget) Isaiah 49:15 - "Can a mother forget the baby at her breast and have no compassion on the child she has borne Though she may forget, I will not forget you";;;
(dreamed) Genesis 20:3 - But God came to Abimelek in a dream one night and said to him, You are as good as dead because of the woman you have taken; she is a married woman.;;;
(stir) Haggai 1:14 - So the Lord stirred up the spirit of Zerubbabel son of Shealtiel
(whereon) Genesis 28:18 - "And Jacob rose up early in the morning, and took the stone that he had put for his pillows, and set it up for a pillar, and poured oil upon the top of it.";;;
(awaked) 1 Corinthians 15:34 - "Awake to righteousness, and sin not; for some have not the knowledge of God: I speak this to your shame.";;;
(dreadful) Psalm 139:14 - I will praise thee; for I am fearfully and wonderfully made: marvellous are thy works; and that my soul knoweth right well.;
(hezron) 1 Chronicles 2:9 - The sons of hezron that were born unto him were Jerahmeel
(vowed) "From there they continued on to Gibeah of Benjamin and Saul counted the men who were with him. They numbered about six hundred." - 1 Samuel 13:15;;;
(vow) "When you make a vow to the Lord your God, do not delay to fulfill it, for he will surely demand it of you, and you will be guilty of sin." - Deuteronomy 23:21 NIV;;;
(lying) Proverbs 12:22 - "The Lord detests lying lips, but he delights in people who are trustworthy.";;;

(rachel) Jeremiah 31:15 - "This is what the LORD says: 'A voice is heard in Ramah, mourning and great weeping, rachel weeping for her children and refusing to be comforted, because they are no more.'";;;
(roll) Proverbs 16:33 - "The lot is cast into the lap, but its every decision is from the LORD.";;;

(tidings) Isaiah 52:7 - "How beautiful upon the mountains are the feet of him that bringeth good tidings, that publisheth peace; that bringeth good tidings of good, that publisheth salvation; that saith unto Zion, Thy God reigneth";;;
